name: The Far Kingdoms: Age of Solitaire
description: "Age of Solitaire" is the third part of the famous "The far Kingdom" series. Play different Solitaire versions and use the power of the magic cards to help Arianna rebuild her kingdom!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.2GHz Prozessor Memory: 128 MB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
